sqlMap.select: select OS_ID as osId, OS_CATE as osCate, OS_TIME as osTime, OS_LOCATION as osLocation, OS_LIMIT as osLimit, OS_STATUS as osStatus, OS_COST as osCost, OS_BOOK_LINK as osBook_link from OUTPATIENT_SERVICE ops

select OS_ID as osId, OS_CATE as osCate, OS_TIME as osTime, OS_LOCATION as osLocation, OS_LIMIT as osLimit, OS_STATUS as osStatus, OS_COST as osCost, OS_BOOK_LINK as osBook_link from OUTPATIENT_SERVICE ops where OS_ID = #osId#

select OS_ID as osId, OS_CATE as osCate, OS_TIME as osTime, OS_LOCATION as osLocation, OS_LIMIT as osLimit, OS_STATUS as osStatus, OS_COST as osCost, OS_BOOK_LINK as osBook_link from OUTPATIENT_SERVICE ops

select COUNT(DI_ID) from DOCTOR_INFO
di.DI_NAME Like CONCAT('%',#diName#,'%')
di.DI_DEPTTYPE = #diDeptType#
famops.OS_TIME Like CONCAT('%',#osTime#,'%') or perops.OS_TIME Like CONCAT('%',#osTime#,'%')

select DI_ID as diId, DI_NAME as diName, od.OD_ID as diDeptId, od.OD_NAME as diDeptName, DI_MAJOR as diMajor, famops.OS_CATE as osfCate, famops.OS_TIME as osfTime, famops.OS_LOCATION as osfLocation, famops.OS_COST as osfCost, famops.OS_LIMIT as osfLimit, famops.OS_STATUS as osfStatus, perops.OS_CATE as osCate, perops.OS_TIME as osTime, perops.OS_LOCATION as osLocation, perops.OS_COST as osCost, perops.OS_LIMIT as osLimit, perops.OS_STATUS as osStatus from DOCTOR_INFO di left join OUTPATIENT_SERVICE famops on famops.OS_ID = di.OS_FAMOUS_ID left join OUTPATIENT_SERVICE perops on perops.OS_ID = di.OS_EXPERT_ID left join OFFICE_DETAIL od on od.OD_ID = di.DI_DEPTTYPE
di.DI_NAME Like CONCAT('%',#condition.diName#,'%')
di.DI_DEPTTYPE = #condition.diDeptType#
famops.OS_TIME Like CONCAT('%',#condition.osTime#,'%') or perops.OS_TIME Like CONCAT('%',#condition.osTime#,'%')
ORDER BY DI_ORDER LIMIT #start#,#pageSize#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OUTPATIENT_SERVICE SET OS_ID = #osId#, OS_CATE = #osCate#, OS_TIME = #osTime#, OS_LOCATION = #osLocation#, OS_LIMIT = #osLimit#, OS_STATUS = #osStatus#, OS_COST = #osCost#, OS_BOOK_LINK = #osBook_link# WHERE OS_ID = #osId#
